## firstlevel 

```{r}
#| context: setup
library(psych)
bfi <- data(bfi)
```

## heya {.sidebar}

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(shiny)
sampleSize <- NULL
sliderInput('sampleSize', 'Sample Size', 
            min=0, max=nrow(bfi),
            value=min(1000, nrow(bfi)), 
            step=100, round=0)
```

##

```{r}
plotOutput('bfiplot')
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)


bfi$jibberish <- rowMeans(bfi[1:10], na.rm=TRUE)
bfi$gobbleyjook <- rowMeans(bfi[11:20], na.rm=TRUE)

output$bfiplot <- renderPlot({
ggplot(
  bfi(), 
  aes_string(x = jibberish, y = gobbleyjook)) + geom_point()
  
  })
```
